short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your daily To-Do list & store the important links from current Tab. Easy to use checklist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your personal task manager to make your life easier. Simple, clean and beautiful UI that's make easy to use. Wonderful todo list and personal task list manager that will help to stay focused and complete your daily tasks on time.
You can save URL of the current working tab for easy access and can use later.
It helps you to organise your routine tasks on time and will help to make your day more productive.
We don't collect your any data.

Key Features:- 

- No login required.
- Free to use.  
- One click functionality.
- Save the URL from the current tab.
- Easy keyboard shortcuts.
- Complete privacy to users.
- Easy to access.
